titleInfo.title: An Extension of Neural Gas to Local PCA

mods.abstract: We suggest an extension of the neural gas vector quantization method to local principal component analysis. The distance measure for the competition between local units combines a normalized Mahalanobis distance in the principal subspace and the squared reconstruction error, with the weighting of both measures depending on the residual variance in the minor subspace. A recursive least-squares method performs the local principal component analysis. The method is tested on synthetic two- and three-dimensional data and on the recognition of handwritten digits.
